name: Binance Yellow Robot
description: $BINA is a community-driven memecoin born from an online event involving a fake Binance mascot and a social media interaction by Binance’s former CEO, CZ. The project originated when a grifter used edited images and CZ’s follow to create false legitimacy, causing temporary market hype. After the original scam collapsed, the crypto community reclaimed the narrative, transforming the chaos into a decentralized social experiment. $BINA now represents transparency, satire, and community resilience within crypto culture, preserving the story as a reminder of how collective action can turn manipulation into meaning.
